structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Executive Office For Administration And Finance

law.text: [ Text of section effective until January 1, 2013. Repealed by 2012, 165, Sec. 66. See 2012, 165, Sec. 137.] If any provision or clause of sections thirty-nine A through forty-three F, inclusive, of this chapter, or application thereof is held invalid, such invalidity shall not affect other provisions or applications of the aforesaid sections which can be given effect without the invalid provision or application, and to this end the provisions of the aforesaid sections are declared to be severable.
